item.title: JetBlue shares tumble 25% after disappointing outlook
item.description: The airline is in the middle of a plan to reduce costs by culling unprofitable routes and drumming up revenue with higher-priced seats.

item.title: Boeing CEO upbeat on recovery plan after company's biggest annual loss since 2020
item.description: Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg faces investors after the beleaguered company posts its sixth annual loss.
